meaningMnemonic: Back in the day, a <kanji>bullet</kanji> was a <kanji>circle</kanji> shape. So, this word is <vocabulary>bullet</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The 弾 part is okay, but you never learned the on'yomi reading of 丸, which is がん. When you shoot a bullet, you are using a <reading>gun</reading> (がん). Bang!
